attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Each time a company off-shores its services hundreds of jobs go from the UK. We the british tax payer have to pay for these people who loose there jobs. It is about time the companies paid or keep the jobs in the UK.
These companies only do this for PROFIT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
